A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's as if the cut The Empire Strikes Back and The Return Of The Jedi all into 1 film...There's so much they could of dove  into from the expanded universe to make a new movie but no they decided too take 2 of the original trilogy films and put them into 1 film....I didn't think anyone could ruin star wars more then George Lucas(by re-cutting then re-releasing the films)  But clearly Rian Johnson now has the title of that claim....
